posts.postText: I'm having a bit of issues with PayPal, meaning I'm going to need to have Ben take TTT donations, or for a short while not accept TTT donations. I'm trying to work this out, worst-case scenario is that I'll lose all the money on my PayPal account (Which at the moment is only about $70). Either way, I'm going to need to refund a few people and have them send the money to either Ben or a new PayPal account, once I get it set up.
